verses.verse: (Ps. 1:1; Prov. 1:15) Do not enter the path of the wicked, And do not walk in the way of evil.
Avoid it, do not travel on it; Turn away from it and pass on.
(Ps. 36:4; Mic. 2:1) For they do not sleep unless they have done evil; And their sleep is taken away unless they make someone fall.
For they eat the bread of wickedness, And drink the wine of violence.
(Is. 26:7; Matt. 5:14, 45; Phil. 2:15) But the path of the just (2 Sam. 23:4) is like the shining sun, That shines ever brighter unto the perfect day.
(1 Sam. 2:9; (Job 18:5, 6); Prov. 2:13; (Is. 59:9, 10; Jer. 23:12); John 12:35) The way of the wicked is like darkness; They do not know what makes them stumble.
My son, give attention to my words; Incline your ear to my sayings.
Do not let them depart from your eyes; Keep them in the midst of your heart;
For they are life to those who find them, And health to all their flesh.
Keep your heart with all diligence, For out of it spring the issues of ((Matt. 12:34; 15:18, 19; Mark 7:21; Luke 6:45)) life.
Put away from you a deceitful mouth, And put perverse lips far from you.
Let your eyes look straight ahead, And your eyelids look right before you.
Ponder the path of your (Prov. 5:21; Heb. 12:13) feet, And let all your ways be established.
Do not turn to the right or the left; Remove your foot from evil.
(The Peril of Adultery) My son, pay attention to my wisdom; Lend your ear to my understanding,
That you may preserve discretion, And your lips (Mal. 2:7) may keep knowledge.
(Prov. 2:16) For the lips of an immoral woman drip honey, And her mouth is (Ps. 55:21) smoother than oil;
But in the end she is bitter as wormwood, Sharp as a two-edged sword.
Her feet go down to death, (Prov. 7:27) Her steps lay hold of hell.
Lest you ponder her path of lifeâ€” Her ways are unstable; You do not know them.
Therefore hear me now, my children, And do not depart from the words of my mouth.
Remove your way far from her, And do not go near the door of her house,
Lest you give your honor to others, And your years to the cruel one;
